idea:
We provide Software like Autodesk, Bentley, Microsoft as well as Cloud services BIM services and architectural structural services.

We are a one stop solution for any organization's cloud based software and deep tech requirements. We have offices in Mumbai and Nagpur

We are primarily focused on providing top of the class ‘Consultative’ managed cloud services. Our expertise comes from over decade long experiences working with customers from the Public Sector, IT/ITES, Education, Banking and Financial Services, Manufacturing, Start-ups, Education and Hospitality verticals. 

We provide managed services in the IAAS/PAAS space like Cloud Architectural Designing, Cloud Setup / Migration, Cost Optimization, Security and Governance etc. 

Our USP is OEM unbiasedness, we ensure you get the best service from the best available cloud platforms.  

Currently, our organization is humbled to partner up with cloud providers like Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services and Google Cloud Platform to name a few. 

Our core objective is to deliver enhanced value at highly optimized costs. 

We also provide consultation and implementation of various productivity solutions like: 

Microsoft O365 / M365 (Including Teams) 

Security - Enterprise Mobility and Security / Advanced Threat Protection / Private/Public Key based Certificate Management / Multi Factor Authentication . 

Apps & Developer Tools - SQL Servers, Windows Servers, Exchange Servers etc.
name: Apple Infotech

idea:

``We believe design or management alone is not the key to success .we have to Bring all markets forces together to ensure a long term engagement for our client and projects.``
name: Natures Adora LLP

idea:
BikeDost is India's first chain of smart two-wheeler workshops, offering two-wheeler owners an unparalleled experience in two-wheeler management. It aims to leverage technology to offer standardized service quality and a host of two-wheeler management solutions enabling a hassle free ownership.


BikeDost's vision is to be India's largest two-wheeler service brand. It plans to achieve its vision by creating 5,000+ entrepreneurial setups generating employment for 50,000 people and improving livelihoods of a million people in the automobile ecosystem.
name: BikeDost

idea:
BUSINESS CROWN (BUSINESS CONSULTANCY) is an Online Digital Marketing Agency which is commenced in Mira road Mumbai,Maharashtra. It is operated online. We are going to provide various kinds of BUSINESS & LEGAL SERVICES to our upcoming clients. Our Business services Includes : BUSINESS IDEAS,GRAPHIC DESIGNING,LOGO MAKING,BUSINESS BRANDING,CONSULTANCY FOR BUSINESS GROWTH,ZERO INVESTMENT BUSINESS OPPORTUNITY,FREELANCING,AFFILIATE MARKETING,SOCIAL MEDIA MARKETING, AATMA-NIRBHAR BHARAT MAKING INITIATIVE & many more coming soon.

Our legal services includes : LLP REGISTRATION,ITR FILING, GSTR FILING, PASSPORT ASSISTANCE, AADHAR UPGRADATION, PAN UPGRADATION,TAX CONSULTANCY & many more coming soon.


We are the Enterprises which has initiated to help other businesses to grow exponentially & progressively. Our motto is to make people aware about AATMA-NIRBHAR BHARAT & to promote Indian products & services & other Indian equipments to use for their activities. We will be working on PSP(PROBLEM SOLVING PRODUCT) & NFP(NEED FULFILLING PRODUCT)


Our......

Vision : To grow exponentially & to make our clients business grow successfully.

Mission : To make Indian products & services sustainable with their benefits & result oriented strategies.

Objective : 

To provide best services to our clients & to solve problems of the prospects & fulfill need of the prospects.
